title: Far Cry 3 Blood Dragon v1.02 [multilang] [full] [non-Steam]
description:
=============================================================================
Far Cry 3 Blood Dragon v1.02                                                =
=============================================================================

Multilanguage



=============================================================================
Info of this Jimbus edition:                                                =
=============================================================================

 - Custom installer compressed.
 
 - The game is updated to the last version until today (1.02).

 - Several languages (none of them has been deleted), being possible to change among them. 

 - The libraries the game requires are also included.



=============================================================================
Instructions:                                                               =
=============================================================================

1. Mount, burn or just unzip the .iso file.
2. Run "Setup.exe" to install the game.
3. Use the shortcuts the installer creates to play.



=============================================================================
FAQ:                                                                        =
=============================================================================

Q: Do I need Steam to play?
A: No.


Q: Does it work under Windows 8?
A: It should work, but it has only been tested under Windows 7. 



Notice this is not an update but the full game. Do not install it over an existing installation.
